original: @95b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @95b rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya manydzu shr'i shri n'a ma aashta sha ta kam/
analyzed: a'arya manydzu shr'i shri n'a ma aashta sha ta kam/
translated: Ārya-Mañjuśrī-śrīnāma-aṣṭaśataka

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa /
translated: The Noble One Hundred and Eight Names of Mañjuśrī

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag @96a *//
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag @96a *//
translated: Homage to the youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: 'tshal lo // shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: 'tshal lo // shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a very clear mind,

original: thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te //
translated: bowing one's head to the Sage,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi //
translated: the names praised by the Buddhas

original: mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi //
analyzed: mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi //
translated: are to be recited here.

original: gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste //
translated: Having a beautiful form, endowed with form,

original: gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med //
analyzed: gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med //
translated: unsurpassed in all forms,

original: mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs //
analyzed: mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs //
translated: fully perfected in all characteristics,

original: 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa lags //
translated: Mañjuśrī is the supreme glory.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral //
translated: Inconceivable, free from thought,

original: mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung //
analyzed: mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung //
translated: with inconceivable strength, wondrous,

original: sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sku gsung 'phrin las bsam mi khyab //
translated: with inconceivable body, speech, and activity,🔽and likewise, inconceivable mind.

original: de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab; ;stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab; ;stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: The essence of meditation on emptiness,

original: stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan //
translated: endowed with the empty Dharma,

original: stong pa nyid la lhag par mos //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lhag par mos //
translated: And have a special interest in emptiness.

original: srid pa gsum po stong par ston //
analyzed: srid pa gsum po stong par ston //
translated: They teach that the three existences are empty.

original: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs //
translated: They are omniscient and see everything.

original: sa rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
analyzed: sa rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
translated: They are the supreme ones of all the levels.

original: sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
translated: They are the supreme ones among all sentient beings.

original: sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa //🔽ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du //
analyzed: sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa // ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du //
translated: They are worshipped by all sentient beings.🔽They conquer all the lower realms and likewise

original: mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms //
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams thams cad 'joms //
translated: All the tīrthikas.

original: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa //
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa //
translated: They defeat the adversaries.

original: smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /
analyzed: smra ba'i seng+ge mi yi mchog /
translated: They are the lions of speech, the supreme ones among men.🔽They are disciplined and have no afflictive enemies

original: dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang // sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'//
analyzed: dul zhing nyon mongs dgra rnams dang // sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'//
translated: Or any obscurations or stains.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob //
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob //
translated: They are the protectors of all sentient beings.

original: grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa //
analyzed: grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa //
translated: They are liberated and liberate the world.🔽They have matted hair and are disciplined.

original: ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs @96b can; ;tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
analyzed: ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs @96b can; ;tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
translated: They are Brahmā, residing in the abode of Brahmā.

original: bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams //
analyzed: bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams //
translated: They hold a rosary and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: dag cing dag pa rnams dang ldan //
analyzed: dag cing dag pa rnams dang ldan //
translated: They are pure and possess purity.

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' bdag mdzad //
translated: They are Mañjughoṣa, the lords.

original: padma las 'khrungs padma can //
analyzed: padma las 'khrungs padma can //
translated: You are born from a lotus, you are the lotus-holder.

original: padma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra //
analyzed: padma'i ze ba'i kha dog 'dra //
translated: You are the color of a lotus filament.

original: bzhugs pa'i gdan khri padma lags //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i gdan khri padma lags //
translated: Your seat is a lotus.

original: gtsang ma autpal sngon po bsnams //
analyzed: gtsang ma autpal sngon po bsnams //
translated: You hold a pure blue lotus.

original: bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan //
analyzed: bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan //
translated: You have a pure and peaceful mind.

original: khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas //
analyzed: khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas //
translated: You are a Buddha, a Solitary Buddha.

original: khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags //
analyzed: khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags //
translated: You are the first Buddha.

original: rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes //
translated: You have miraculous powers and have attained mastery.

original: bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po //
analyzed: bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po //
translated: You are the teacher of the four noble truths.

original: 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'//
analyzed: 'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'//
translated: You are the protector of the world, you have a thousand eyes.

original: khyod ni dbang phyug skye rgu'i bdag /
analyzed: khyod ni dbang phyug skye rgu'i bdag /
translated: You are the lord, the master of beings.

original: khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams //
translated: You are the peaceful one, you are the sentient beings.

original: kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso //🔽khyod ni khyu mchog skye rgu'i gtso //
analyzed: kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso // khyod ni khyu mchog skye rgu'i gtso //
translated: You are the lord of all, you are the chief of qualities.🔽You are the bull, you are the master of beings.

original: thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs //
analyzed: thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs //
translated: You are the eldest, you know the past lives.

original: rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa //
analyzed: rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa //
translated: You are the guide, you are the one who tames.

original: rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs //
analyzed: rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs //
translated: You are the son of the Victorious Ones, born from the Victorious Ones themselves.

original: 'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod //
analyzed: 'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod //
translated: You are the sun, you have a thousand light rays.

original: zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod //
analyzed: zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod //
translated: You are the moon, you are the planet Jupiter.

original: rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags //
analyzed: rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags //
translated: You are Vaiśravaṇa and Varuṇa,

original: dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod //
analyzed: dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod //
translated: You are the great Īśvara and Viṣṇu,

original: klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod //
analyzed: klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod //
translated: You are the king of the nāgas, Ananta,

original: de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags //
analyzed: de bzhin sde dpon skem byed lags //
translated: And likewise the general Skanda.

original: lha min dbang po thags bzang ris //
analyzed: lha min dbang po thags bzang ris //
translated: You are the lord of the asuras, Vemacitrin,

original: mig dmar gza' lag pa sangs //
analyzed: mig dmar gza' lag pa sangs //
translated: You are the planets Mars, Mercury,

original: spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags //
analyzed: spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags //
translated: And Saturn, the hero of all gods.

original: lha rnams kun gyis phyag @97a *//
analyzed: lha rnams kun gyis phyag @97a *//
translated: You are the one to whom all gods

original: bgyis pa // 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral //
analyzed: bgyis pa // 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral //
translated: Pay homage, free from the stains of worldly phenomena.

original: khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /
analyzed: khyod ni 'jig rten gang zag mchog /
translated: You are the supreme person in the world,

original: 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /
analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /
translated: The knower of the world, the knower of the world's phenomena,

original: ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa //
analyzed: ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa //
translated: The supreme one among the wise,

original: dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs //
analyzed: dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs //
translated: The giver of the supreme, the refuge, the protector.

original: bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi //
analyzed: bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi brdzi //
translated: You are not crushed by the deeds of Māra,

original: kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab //
analyzed: kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab //
translated: You are free from faults, profound,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags //🔽khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags // khyod ni sman pa zug rngu 'byin //
translated: The spiritual friend renowned everywhere,🔽The doctor who removes pain.

original: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /🔽blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan //
analyzed: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog / blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan //
translated: You are the supreme charioteer of humans to be trained,🔽You are wise, you are realized,

original: blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags //
analyzed: blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags //
translated: You are intelligent, you are learned.

original: khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing //
analyzed: khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing //
translated: You are the wish-fulfilling tree of merit,

original: byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the flowers of the branches of enlightenment,

original: rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
translated: Abundant with the fruit of complete liberation.🔽You have become the supreme one among all embodied beings.

original: lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur; ;yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa //
analyzed: lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur; ;yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa //
translated: Delightful and captivating,

original: sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod //
analyzed: sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod //
translated: Free from negativity, pure in conduct,

original: khyod ni mjug ring gza' mchog lags //
analyzed: khyod ni mjug ring gza' mchog lags //
translated: You are the supreme planet, Ketu.

original: khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /
analyzed: khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /
translated: You are the supreme sage, the Muni,

original: khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba //
translated: You are the anointed regent,

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso bo lags //
translated: The foremost lord of the ten grounds.

original: ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso //
analyzed: ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso //
translated: The captain, the leader of beings,

original: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin //
translated: You reveal the supreme transcendence of suffering.

original: khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin //
analyzed: khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin //
translated: You are like space, earth, and water,

original: khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu //
analyzed: khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu //
translated: You are like fire and wind,

original: khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
analyzed: khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
translated: You are like the wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad //
analyzed: sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad //
translated: Fulfilling the hopes of all beings.🔽Prostrated to by all beings,

original: 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis @97b pa; ;rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis @97b pa; ;rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, O Jewel!

original: 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa //
translated: Mañjuśrī then spoke:

original: aom w'a kye dam na ma sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom w'a kye dam na ma sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vākyedanama svāhā.🔽“If one memorizes the names as stated,

original: ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni //
analyzed: ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni //
translated: together with the vidyā,

original: sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob //
analyzed: sdig gyur rnam dag rab tu thob //
translated: one will attain the complete purification of evil.

original: brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan //
analyzed: brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan //
translated: “The names are more than one hundred and eight.

original: skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa //
analyzed: skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa //
translated: Whoever reads them at the three junctures of the day🔽will undoubtedly accomplish all that they wish for,

original: de 'dod bsam rgu yid bzhin du; ;gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'dod bsam rgu yid bzhin du; ;gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: just as they desire.

original: bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni //🔽mtshams med skal pa mnyam pa yi //
analyzed: bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni // mtshams med skal pa mnyam pa yi //
translated: “If one recalls the auspicious names,🔽even if one has committed terrible acts🔽with the same karmic result as the heinous crimes,

original: las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa; ;de dag thams cad myur du 'byang //
analyzed: las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa; ;de dag thams cad myur du 'byang //
translated: all of them will quickly be purified.🔽“When one is about to leave this world

original: 'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe //
translated: and great fear arises,

original: sems can dag pas dran byas na //
analyzed: sems can dag pas dran byas na //
translated: if one recalls Mañjuśrī,

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur //
translated: one will attain Mañjuśrī.

original: blo dang ldan pas dran byas te //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas dran byas te //
translated: “If the wise one, having recollected him,

original: nges par gnas nas su klog pa //
analyzed: nges par gnas nas su klog pa //
translated: recites the names while remaining focused,

original: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang //
translated: even if one desires buddhahood itself,

original: thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ////
analyzed: thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ////
translated: one will attain it without doubt.

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The one hundred and eight names of noble Mañjuśrī is complete.
